name: Hunters Rite
description:
Have you ever wanted to become a monster hunter? You may have even wondered what it takes. To become a real monster hunter you need to complete one small task, a short adventure, a final exam, or, as hunters call it, go through a rite. You need to go down to the darkest dungeon and bring the head of the most terrible monster that lives there. But no one said you can't take friends with you.

Hunters Rite is an action rogue-like pixel local co-op-oriented dungeon crawler.

Team:
